I'd say the feeling's mutual, but you were too stupid to even bring a gun. Aren't you from Florida? They're not exactly commies about it.

Well, havin' guns on hand does make me feel better. You should get one yourself, see what it does for ya. I know Florida's full of rednecks who sell 'em.
Yeah. I killed a lot of people. With both hands.
Yeah, I racked up a body count. It tends to happen when you actually fire your guns in between smoke breaks.
Yeah, well, I think our boss considers us a good team, too. He's always sendin' us off together when there's a job to do.
You're not alone in that. Our boss Dutch must think I pair up with Rock pretty well, 'cause he always sticks us with the same errands.
Tch. If you think we make a good team, then congrats, so does Lagoon Company. I'm always workin' with the guy--even had to be his bodyguard in Japan.
...Man, you really think I'm about to put one between your eyes, don't you? Can't believe all it takes a scare a bitch these days is a couple big-girl words and two guns.
Are you really so worried just 'cause I threw out a couple swears and I've got guns swingin' around my tits? Believe me, bitch, I haven't started threatening you.
...Listen up, you skinny goth bitch. If you keep playin' psychiatrist, that fur coat is gonna hang on my door next to your little pet's skin. You don't fuckin' know me.
...I hope you're a better dogfighter than psychiatrist, Virgin Black. All the bullshit I spin your way, and you doubt the one part I wish was a lie.
Man, you really can't just admit you said somethin' stupid, can you? Let's say Mr. Recipient doesn't feel like paying. How do you think I should make him play ball?
You really can't picture why a girl who works with the mob might wanna pack heat on any given job? Guess it's true when they say the more you go to school, the dumber you get.
Oh gee, I wonder if the mob enforcer might have made some enemies over the years. You're right--I should walk around with a fuckin' lollipop.
I can tell from your Hot Topic getup that you ain't exactly street-smart, but Christ. Even on courier duty, you think things always go smoothly? What if the dude doesn't pay up?
Fuck's sake. The dumbest bitches really are the smart ones. How do you think I make sure the guy I'm delivering to doesn't stiff us? I know you might suck his dick, but I have self-respect.
When did I say I was Animal Control? I don't think a ghost's got much cash to give me, anyway.
...I don't like the way you said that. I'm not in the business of puttin' down rabid dogs on your front lawn, especially for some dead bitch who can't sign checks.
No way, honey. Anything you see outta Hollywood is watered-down compared to the real thing.
I like cheesy action movies, too, but trust me. They ain't shit compared to what I live through.
Well, good for you, Moneybags. What the fuck am I gonna do with one, anyway? Play Minesweeper?
I'm sure you wipe your ass with hundred-dollar-bills, too. Those things are expensive. And I don't get paid to sit on a fuckin' keyboard, anyway.
Weren't you calling me a badass before? What, it's OK to blow a guy up as long as he melts all at once?
I thought we were comparing stunts. So it's OK to wrestle a zoo animal, or blow up a helicopter, but don't splatter any brains on the wall?
I figured just by lookin' at you that we didn't have much in common, but shit, I don't think I could ask you the time without getting lost.
Eh, it's alright. I was never real good at fitting in with other girls, tryin' to follow what they were saying. You're even worse than that, but whatever.
Yeah, I used to be a stage girl, and that didn't have nearly as much quiet time. This job'll kill me sooner or later, and then I'll get a nice long nap.
Well, hey. One of these days a stray bullet'll find its mark, and I'll have plenty of quiet time after that. It's more dignified than shakin' my ass onstage for my last job.
You sure? I've run into yakuza sword nuts before. I guess they are weirdly open about bein' the mafia.
Huh. I guess the thing with yakuza is that they'll actually tell you they're mobsters if you ask, the weird fucks. So just what are you?
Never thought of havin' a slogan myself. Maybe back when I was a stage girl--"Miss Revy's gonna make you squirm."
Marketing yourself, huh? I haven't had to do that since I was shakin' my ass onstage as Miss Revy. Now I'm just the gun.
...So you do commercials for video games, or something? I've never seen you on TV. The most marketing I ever did was callin' myself Two Hands.
You do ads? You're dressed up for it. I'm not the diplomatic marketing type, you know? I'd rather just force 'em to take what I've got.
They'd have to drop a nuke on my town to root out all the piracy dealers. Not to mention drug runners and lowlifes.
All of 'em? I guess you live in a town where the cops actually give a shit. Roanapur's nothing but scum.

condition.saying: But as much as I'd like to run away

case.state: ...Somethin' wrong, Birdo? All the blood's drained outta your face, and I don't think it's gone down to your snatch.
There ya go, strippin' with the best of 'em...yo, Burnout, you've got the deer-in-headlights look going. Was it somethin' I said?

Fuckin' Christ. Maybe I'll rearrange your face into a smile. You'll look happier, and I won't be such a wildcard.
Don't talk like I'm the one seein' all that money. I live n' eat with Lagoon Company, so it's a miracle I even get a paycheck.

Yeah, must be nice to be at the top a' that grift. Me, I'd make more money looting the junkies' pockets after an OD.

Yeah, I woulda tossed the whole idea if I had to cough up some cash for to get in here. I'm more disposable than my wallet is.

Ghosts? Shit, that's encouraging, isn't it?
"You're dead already, buddy, now get out there!"

Do I look Cuban to you? I don't need to be chomping down on a big brown burning dick all day.

Uh...well, you just broke my morale, kiddo, because I am completely fuckin' lost.

Ah Christ, don't start fuckin' crying on me. I hate it when people cry. Just...fuckin' swear at me or something.
Fuckin' hell, here comes the waterworks. Guess you're not the type to square up and call me a cunt.

Please. I was handlin' guns long before Dutch gave me these gloves--but they sure look fuckin' cool, don't they?
Don't get greedy, Lipstick.
OK, that's where I draw the line. You think I'm made of money for these fuckin' things?
OK, fuck no. You're not bummin' a cig offa me, bitch, I only got, like, five of 'em.

What, you think I got her on speed dial? She's not my fuckin' friend, Smurfette. Besides, she's taken.

Sorry to tramp on your dreams of interracial lesbo funtimes, but she's already doin' cybersex with our computer guy, Benny.

...Tan. What part of Chinese don't you fuckin' understand?

That's not a Thailand summer suntan, dipshit, I work by night! Don't you know a Chinatown rat when you see one?

...I hate timid little shitstains. No fun at all.

Oh yeah, I'm talkin' a big game. Says the bitch who just drifted offa Mount Olympus to smite us all.

If you wanted me to take that seriously, maybe you shoulda come dressed in somethin' a little more humble, Medusa.
And I'll gladly slice your holy balls off. See, two can play at this game.

I kinda doubt they have poker in happy-happy-Cloud City, so it's more likely I'm gonna grind your angelic balls on my boot.
Oho, and now the Boy Wonder is all fuckin' smug. We'll see how he likes a mortal girl tearin' his balls off.

...You there? Fuckin' Hell, now she's sneakin' glances at me.

Tell her to stay outta Thailand, then, 'cause you really need to swear to get through the day there.
Well, ain't she a good little church girl? Must live in a place that's not a shithole.

The dirtier your home is, the dirtier your mouth gets. If she ever leaves the rose garden, she'll start swearing.

Jesus Christ, Greenie, I just took my gloves off and you're ranting about cum. We'll get there.
One hell of a coked-up whore, huh, Green Beret? Do you always bring up cum when guests take their gloves off?
Light work, got it. So this shit is where you make your real cash, right?
Ohhh, I get it. Little mercenary work on the side, then it's back to poledancing and glory holes.
Light work in between dicksuckings? Yeah, you seem like the type.
So I'm just getting in the way of your real job, right? Some doof is gonna come stuff a twenty in your ass soon?

I don't have a fuckin' agenda, kid. Maybe in your basement dungeon people play these little mindgames, but I just want some tits.
Jesus, you're polite. Don't you ever get mad at people? Like, if I called ya a cunt or somethin'?
What's it gonna take for you to get mad, anyway? I smoke, I swear, I bitch, and you're a-OK with it.
You're really as much of a fuckin' doormat as a figured. Old-timey girls just lettin' people walk all over 'em...aren't you mad at all?

You wanna know what I like in people? When they don't talk in circles about stupid bullshit. I live in the gutter's culture now.

What, did you get five thousand cigarette burns? C'mon, don't pussy out with bad memories, kid. They'll eat you alive.
...Listen, kid, you're gonna meet girls in life who make me look like a goddamn saint. You can't let your past fuck with you, too.
...I can't believe I'm havin' this conversation with a goddamn talking lamb.

I'm gettin' used to you myself. I just remembered I'm talking to a fuckin' lamb, so I need another drag.
Oho. Ohohohoho. You wanna see how idle my threats are, cupcake, let's take this outside.

Idle? Oh, honey. You wanna call me out on the shit I say, then the parking lot's gonna turn into fuckin' Nagasaki.
Glad we came to an agreement, Froggy. Or should I say, you surrendered?

If you know a chick who can dodge bullets, baby, I'd love to prove her wrong. It sure as fuck ain't you.
